mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_table(boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardContents})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_table SET boardHits=boardHits+1 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents, boardHits, date_format(createdAt, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS createdAt FROM board_table WHERE id = #{id};
